website_summaries.verdict: This non-electric thermal pet bed is a great affordable option.
pros: If you are averse to the idea of electric heat or are just looking for something cheaper, this thermal pet bed works well
A wide range of sizes and shapes are available, making this a great choice for dog or cat owners
cons: The thermal layer makes a crinkling noise, but this makes no difference to pets

website_summaries.verdict: Everyone knows cats like the warmest sleeping spot in the house, so why not provide it to them with this bargain-priced, super soft, cozy cat bed that's big enough for two?
pros: The bed is lined with a layer of heat-reflecting material that uses Mittens' own body heat to warm the bed up to sleep-temperature perfection
A thick layer of cushy faux wool plush provides the kind of cozy feel no cat can resist
At 19 inches across, the bed is sizable enough for large cats or small dogs
cons: None to speak of, but some cats prefer to sleep up high and so might reject the bed if it's on the floor

customer_reviews.title: Picky cat and weird dog
customer_reviews.text: The bad news: my cat doesn’t like this bed. He laid in it once and never again. The good news: my 60 lb pit bull loves it and sleeps in it every night LOL
customer_reviews.author: B. MillsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Kitty loves it!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bed, and our cat showed no interest in it. We sprayed it with Cat Nip, and nothing - not interested. Then, I picked the cat up while he slept, and placed him in the bed. He slept in it for three hours, and he loved it! This is perfect for him! Though he is a slender and long cat, he curls up and still fits in it. I will buy another. :)
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Knight

customer_reviews.title: 5 of 5 Cats Give a Paw's Up Vote
customer_reviews.text: All five of the fur-monsters love these beds. Sprinkled a bit of catnip in each bed to encourage exploration.... it worked.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Buy one for each cat!!
customer_reviews.text: I had to order a second bed, because my two cats are fighting over the first one I bought. But honestly, it's been kinda funny watching the battles. Trust me, your cat(s) will love this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie D. Van Damme

customer_reviews.title: but it is still an excellent soft bed that my girl prefers
customer_reviews.text: My girl loves this bed. She spends most of her time in it kneading and purring. I don't know about what others have posted about the warming material, but it is still an excellent soft bed that my girl prefers.
customer_reviews.author: A CrawfordTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Our kitty's new favorite bed
customer_reviews.text: Our kitty absolutely loves her new bed! She is just under ten pounds and has plenty of room. She has two other beds but this has definitely become her favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Lilith

customer_reviews.title: The small size can really stretch!
customer_reviews.text: My cat is barely ten pounds, but she managed to kick my fifty pound pitbull out of his bed and take over a 3ftx4ft dog bed. I felt bad for my pup, so I hoped this bed would solve the problem. Well, my cat still loves the dog bed, but luckily the dog found this suitable enough and has claimed it instead.
customer_reviews.author: manders

customer_reviews.title: SOFT, DURABLE, WELL MADE CAT BED
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and comfy looking bed. The material is soft and the product durable. Quick shipping and great packaging. Unfortunately, the photos sum up my experience with this lovely little bed: my cat has not stepped in it once. She IS enjoying the paper the bed was packed in, tho. Can't blame the company -- cats will be cats. Personally I think it's a great cat bed and deserves 5 Stars! Note: It IS on the small side.
customer_reviews.author: DLB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bed!
customer_reviews.text: My 18-year old cat absolutely loves this bed! It took her one day to actually get inside, but has loved it ever since.
customer_reviews.author: S. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Ucomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Same problem as with many other pet beds I had. The filler at the bottom was not fixed properly and moved to one side of the bed few days after my cat started to use it, leaving the other side empty. All in all the bottom of the bed is uneven with bump on one side. So the cat do not really feel comfortable. I mentioned he liked rectangular bed, that he had before. But that bed had similar problem, so I replaced it and got the same problem again. And much faster. The manufacturer of this product is definitely not a pet owner. I'm starting to think about buying a sewing machine and making a cat bed myself. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The bed looks great BUT it was packaged horribly and there is a ...
customer_reviews.text: The bed looks great BUT it was packaged horribly and there is a large dark smudge mark and smells dusty. I'd love for someone to contact me.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Williams

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this bed was not a good purchase. Out of the box the bed looked as if it had been used. I washed the bed to see if the "used look" was just a matter of having been smashed into a small box. After washing it was clear the materials used to construct this bed wouldn't be able to withstand being use by a puppy. Bits of the fabric shed during washing and drying (as shown in photo). As a side note I ordered the BLUE but received the RED.
customer_reviews.author: Rescuer

customer_reviews.title: Kitty AOK approved!
customer_reviews.text: Well life has it's quirks! Got this today and wondered if kitty would try it as she was avoiding her old one big time. All I had to do was add a wee bit of catnip to a corner and in she went! Already asleep now.... and I love it's self warming, she has arthritis in her shoulders so this I hope helps! She's my doll!
customer_reviews.author: Edna M. Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Great bed, good price
customer_reviews.text: My cats love it. I hadn't set it down for five minutes when they found it. They all try to share it without much luck.
customer_reviews.author: Julia K Alston

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it
customer_reviews.text: Just buy it, it's perfect. the cat flops out one side, but she doesn't care. It's super warm and heat reflecting, super big and soft, great price. Best find all year, cat immediately loved it. There is no cetch to this purchase, total Win.
customer_reviews.author: Arkose

customer_reviews.title: Best pet bed ever!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best pet beds ever ! I got 2 of these for my cats. I have purchased beds in the past and my cats would go in for a few minutes and that was it , so I hesitated . I’m so glad I got these. My cats love these beds . They have each claimed one and are in them all the time. These beds are the perfect size. I have a smaller and a larger cat and they are perfect for both. I believe it’s the way they are made . They are warm and soft and snuggly . Even the sides are just the right height ! Best beds ever ! Well made too!
customer_reviews.author: Olympian

customer_reviews.title: The padded, crinkly air bag scared my cat
customer_reviews.text: Other than being shaped like a cat or small dog bed, this thing is anything but that. Save your money. My cat took one look at this thing and ran out of the room. It makes a plastic crinkling noise if you touch it and bulges up in the middle. What the heck does "self warming" mean? Like, if the animal lays on it they'll warm it up? Seriously, this is NOT a selling point, it's the whole point of a bed. I mean, it's like calling your bed "self warming" 'cause you warm it up when you get in. Anyway, I can't say enough con's about this. Steer clear.
customer_reviews.author: ShaneRayBlazer

customer_reviews.title: Kitty Approved!
customer_reviews.text: My cat, named Kitty, loves our DVR box (we have a Charter so it's Comcast boxes from 5+ years ago that heats up) because it keeps her warm. I wanted to buy her a bed that we do not need to plug in but uses her body heat. I bought this bed a couple weeks ago and she loves it and prefers the bed to the cable box. We put the bed right next to the cable box and she would rather sleep in there! She approved it for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Lwhite530

customer_reviews.title: Cat tested, cat approved
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bed. It's pretty well cushioned, and my cat seemed to like it. She has spent a lot of time in it since I got it, and jumped right in when I put it in a high-traffic nap spot. I wish they had it in brown or a neutral color, but this color is unoffensive and subdued. I can't speak to longevity, since I haven't had it for a while, so I'll try to update it later. So that people can have some sense of scale here, I've added a photo with my cat and a ruler, so that you can get an idea of how much space your cat will have.
customer_reviews.author: someRandomEngineer

customer_reviews.title: Not 19.5"!!
customer_reviews.text: The size is a totally misrepresented! It is not 19.5", not even close, see picture. It might fit a small cat, which none of mine are. The description should be accurate, I would have chosen a different bed if I had known the actual size.
customer_reviews.author: Tina T

customer_reviews.title: I have never purchased a cat bed....
customer_reviews.text: I have never purchased a cat bed because cats love boxes. After 39 years I got a dog, the cat was jealous of the dog's bed, so I broke down and bought the cat this bed. What can I say? I feel bad for the last 20 cats i have had. Freddy Mercury loves this bed, he can't resist it. I don't know if they put kitty crack inside or what. I can't attest to weather there is really reflective material in it, but it feels crinkly and he lays in here anytime he isn't in the window. This was money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Toad

customer_reviews.title: My boys love these. We moved from Sunny
customer_reviews.text: My boys love these. We moved from Sunny, warm California, to Cold, rainy, Oregon. These beds keep them super warm. They would never sleep in the beds I got them before. But they seem to love these. One of my cats weighs 11 pounds, the other 19. They both fit, no problem. (Not both in one, in their own. lol)
customer_reviews.author: Julie Healon

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy :)
customer_reviews.text: This is Wilhelmina's first kitty bed and she loves it! (You can see she's all sleepy-eyed in her photo.) It's super soft, warm, thick and squishy. I was a bit worried she may not like the squishiness of it, but she proved me wrong. Upon inspection, it seems to be very well made and made from quality materials. I'm very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: kells

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Kitties Warm
customer_reviews.text: I have a litter of semi-feral kittens that I was worried about staying warm. I have two of these beds set up in covered carriers in the garage, and the kitties love them. They are keeping their shape, and are easy to clean. No one has torn them apart (unlike my outside chairs - frown). One odd thing I noticed; there is condensation between the bottom of the bed and the floor of the carrier? Not sure why. But, maybe it is wicking away moisture? The actual liner - pad doesn't feel moist, and they continue to use them. So, they work and are sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: KForHerbs

customer_reviews.title: Box over a bed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my cats. The reviews were good and it looked comfy. The thing is they are cats and there is nothing better than a box. I introduced the bed, laid them in it, put catnip in it and tried everything to get them to use it. In the end they chose the box it came in and still sleep in their favorite spots. I gave the bed to my mom for her cat and it’s been appreciated. Her cat understands how comfortable, soft and warm this bed is and he’s loving it. I do recommend the bed. It’s good quality. My fuzz balls prefer a box....
customer_reviews.author: coastergirlnikki

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Cozy
customer_reviews.text: I bought a small bed for our kitten and she loves it. Then one of our 70 lb labs was constantly trying to squeeze herself into the kitten's bed. What a sight! She now has her own large dog bed and both pets are happy. Best pet beds ever!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy Cat
customer_reviews.text: 2 of my 3 cats love this thing. It super squishy and soft but the cushion makes a little crinkly noise that scares one of them (which is why only 4 stars).
customer_reviews.author: bree

customer_reviews.title: Ginger-Cat took to it immediately.. Great investment for a HAPPY CAT
customer_reviews.text: We had tried several beds, including hand-me-down beds.. as well as a blanket and pillow... nothing seemed to work for her.. until I bought the Aspen Thermal Self-heating Pet Bed. Ginger-Cat took to this one immediately. It is the perfect size for her.. She makes bread and purrs.. She’ll stretch in it and curl up. As I share in her happiness, I petted and spoke to her and felt her underside for the warmth, I can say for a fact.. this was a wise investment. Ginger-Cat is happy and I’m confident this bed will last many years.
customer_reviews.author: BlackJack

customer_reviews.title: Beds are SMALLER than described!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered two different items from this company - this Self-Warming Cat Bed, and a larger rectangular Dog Bed. In both cases, the measurements just do not add up. The beds are a few inches smaller (in every direction) than the description on the website. The beds are very nice to look at, seem to be well constructed and plush, but just smaller than advertised. That is why I returned them, and that is why I am giving them two stars instead of five. (I HATE false advertising!)
customer_reviews.author: N. Lynch

customer_reviews.title: My cats favorite bed
customer_reviews.text: My cats don't like much, but they love these beds. Would forever recommend. I originally bought one January 2016 for my old cat who needs a soft bed and by September both cats were fighting over it so much I had to get another. They are both so happy they each have one now. I have included some of my favorite pictures of them both in this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Alek

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and cozy cat bed
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I purchased this cat bed! we lost one of our two cats recently and our another cat was so stressed out and sad about it that he could not sleep, eat or use his litter box normally. our two cats were together every day for the last 12 years..I decided to get him some warm and cozy sleeping site to calm him and it worked! he loved this bed from the first sight and spends his every sleep in it. thank you so much for this product!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice for a senior cat!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed for a 15 year old cat. He rarely shows interest in any cat beds, but since he’s getting old and stiff and I frequently find him burrowed into blankets or curled up in the sink that’s right above the heating vent, I thought this would be a good investment. My husband was skeptical, but it has proven to be a 100% winner! He spends most of his days lying in it, even declining to sleep on the bed one night. It makes things easier for my husband when he has to work at home as well, since the cat prefers the bed. Definitely a good choice for old cats.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna G.

customer_reviews.title: Beats every other cat bed cold
customer_reviews.text: We've have multiple cats. Right now we're down to two Oriental Shorthairs (who think anything under 70 degrees is freezing) and one 24-year old (really) one-eyed warrior diva. These are without a doubt the favorite cat beds--the cats love them, and our 24-year old disdains all others for these--nice and soft for her old bones. Best part of all is they wash up beautifully. Terrific cat beds!
customer_reviews.author: Movin' southTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Feral Cats Rated This 5++++ MEOWS!
customer_reviews.text: In below freezing weather, I went outside to check on 2 small feral cats who've been sleeping on this cat bed, which I placed inside a cardboard box, on my back patio. When one feral cat jumped out of the bed, I could literally feel the heat coming off the bed! WOW! Both feral cats give this product 5++++ MEOWS and THANK YOU, VERY MUCH, for the WARM and COZY KITTY BED! Highly recommend for small outdoor animals!
customer_reviews.author: Cymatica

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: Usually my cat is very skeptical of all new things, especially beds. The last bed I purchased for him sat unused for months until he was finally comfortable enough with it to jump in. I was so surprised when he hopped right into this one an hour after I put it out for him. I have a larger cat (13 lbs) and I purchased the small size. He curls up in a little ball and fits perfectly. Every cat is different, but mine happens to love this bed already.
customer_reviews.author: Miller

customer_reviews.title: Sherpa like, warm and great size
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching a long time for small enough round cat bed that is self-heating for my cat pedestal that my cat likes to lay in. He lays in it to look out at the world, and this one fit perfectly and he loves the warmth it generates. I like that its washable. Is thick, not thin and not too too deep.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine O

customer_reviews.title: PICKY CAT
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my cat who refuses to come in the house. I put it in the laundry room to help her stay warm in the winter. To make it more attractive, I put it on a shelf with her food and scattered catnip inside. To date, she has refused to use it and the catnip remains undisturbed. She is a very picky cat and if her food didn't disappear or I didn't hear her meow now and then, I'd think she'd left home for good. I guess she's really a ghost cat. So, my rating is based on the fact I cannot actually rate the product. If my cat used it, I would give it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: paula karlberg

customer_reviews.title: My cat is in love!
customer_reviews.text: 5 minutes in and my baby is already giving her new bed massages to express her gratitude. We cant get her out of it anymore SHE LOVES IT!!! Would give 10 stars if I could!
customer_reviews.author: Jude Ash

customer_reviews.title: Our Finicky Cat Loves This Inexpensive Bed
customer_reviews.text: Our Finicky Cat Loves This Bed. We ended up buying three—one for the office, one for the cat tree, and one for when she throws up on the others! It’s easy to wash by hand, and air dries in a day or two. I can not vouch for the thermal properties, but Ocho craves heat and seems to be getting what she needs from the bed. It’s round and brick-colored, looks nice and cozy. Ocho is only 5 pounds, but I think a cat or dog up to 8 or 10 pounds could snuggle in fine. The same company makes a larger version in a different shape. Great product, bargain price.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to replace the senior cat's bed. He LOVES his kitty baskets. The beet/burgundy/red goes with my living room color scheme beautifully. His old bed was dirty/hairy and just plain ugly. This new one is attractive but the side walls are flimsy and the 20 lb tank of a cat crushes them down. This bed is priced right but you really do get what you pay for. I can already see that it isn't going to hold up as well as his last one but it is priced accordingly and my 20 lb cat doesn't object to it and uses it so I'll give it 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: BETTER THAN MY HUMAN BED
customer_reviews.text: this ibed s tucked into the small dog house i also ordered from amazon. during the winter, it is hard to get the once feral cat, now the most devoted animal, to leave it to come inside to eat. i have not tried washing it yet but will follow directions to put it away for winter. it is easy to vacuum and wipe down the inside with a damp cloth. he has the self heating thin mat for inside, but he prefers his padded house.
customer_reviews.author: kw

customer_reviews.title: It might be fine for younger pets that can get in and out ...
customer_reviews.text: This pet bed is too difficult for my 17 year old cat to get into. I thought it would have a low place for her to access the bed but the "low" spot is barely lower than the rest of the bed. It might be fine for younger pets that can get in and out of it without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: meadowlark

customer_reviews.title: she was snuggled up comfortably in her dog house
customer_reviews.text: My outdoor cat has a small dog house for winters, but even with foam insulation and thick plastic flap door she'd get cold during mid-winter and become an indoor cat during cold spells. I got this last winter and used her old cat bed flipped upside down over this to create a bed sandwich in her house, and on the coldest days she wasn't at the door trying to get in the house, she was snuggled up comfortably in her dog house. She didn't show any alarm at the slight crinkly sound of this bed when it was new, and it quit crinkling completely after she got it broke in.
customer_reviews.author: Tim is me

customer_reviews.title: My cats love this bed, but it is NOT easy to keep clean
customer_reviews.text: Pros Big and flexible enough to hold almost any sized cat. Cons Keeping it clean is almost impossible. Although it is washable, I found that it was unusable for at least a whole day after machine washing because it is so difficult to get dry (it took 3 cycles in the dryer before it was completely dry). But my cats like this bed so much that I gave up trying to keep it clean and just order a new bed and throw out the old one when I can't stand to look at it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: Thought this would be a nice special bed just for her. My cat doesn’t know what it is, what it’s for, or that I got it just for her! She prefers my bed, my pillow, my chair, my lap, my etc. just using it to store her toys that she doesn’t play with. Seems like good durable quality.
customer_reviews.author: J. Allen Lee

customer_reviews.title: Instantly Cat approved!
customer_reviews.text: I just unpacked the box no more than 15 minutes ago, and now both the box and one of the cat beds are already in use!!! (I haven't cut the tags out of the second one yet!) These two self warming cat beds were ment to be for my outside cats!!!! So it looks like we may be ordering a couple more! They are very soft and plush and look to be well made. The true test will be how they handle getting washed. Once I do that, I will provide an update on how that went.
customer_reviews.author: MissyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE FOR KITTY OR DOGGY!!
customer_reviews.text: We have one in every room and two in some rooms......cats dogs, everyone LOVES!!! we have few cats and just rescued a large size yorkie..she is 15 lbs....whenever we can't find any of our cuddle bunnies, u better believe they/he/she will be found in one of the rooms in one of these beds...lol so glad I bought one to try and ended up buying many more and now im back getting another one cuz someone vomited hairballs into one and I will throw it out..lol PLEASE JUST BUY IT...ur furr babies will love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Zar

customer_reviews.title: Now I feel guilt
customer_reviews.text: Now I feel guilt that I should have bought this sooner. This winter was brutal and we have no electricity in the barn. My poor barn cat would find a hole in the hay or sun in a window to try to get warm. I received this cat bed, after very fast shipping, just yesterday. I put it in the back of my capped hay truck, in the barn, with the cat's quilt and hay. This morning, NO CAT! He is always at the door waiting for breakfast! I found him snuggled into this new cat bed kneading! He did not want to get out of his warm new bed! Great price!
customer_reviews.author: M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Cat's new favorite spot
customer_reviews.text: Our cat LOVES this bed. She has slept in this bed every day since purchasing it especially the past few days with the frigid polar vortex temperatures. I definitely think it keeps her warmer. In the past, she would change favorite sleeping spots every few days but this has been her one and only spot lately. In fact, we will move the bed into different rooms just to have her near us! Time to purchase a 2nd one.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but maybe not as inviting for larger cats
customer_reviews.text: Good quality cat bed! The material in the bed is soft and inviting, however my cat prefers stretching out to the max and doesn't seem to prefer this yet. I'm trying to get him to sleep in it, but so far he thinks it's just a catnip station. I would have given this 5 stars if it was just a little larger. In reality, I think only small to medium sized cats will enjoy this.
customer_reviews.author: Maher Dakkak

customer_reviews.title: very pretty, great quality, low price
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these and glad I did. The price was lower than it is now which makes it even better. The beds are pretty and very good quality. They are soft and floppy which should mold to whatever position the cat(s) lay in. They are also roomy enough for a large cat. Most of my cats prefer to snuggle alone but you never know with cats. Years down the road, they change their behavior. Got these for the cats in my unheated garage (they also have electric beds to use out there) but the two six month old cats in the house are having a ball with them right now. I would definitely order these again.
customer_reviews.author: Kimbo

customer_reviews.title: My bony old boy LOVES it
customer_reviews.text: My 17.5 year-old Maine Coon has lost over half his body mass in the last few years from an over active thyroid gland, so he's basically just a furry bag of cold bones now. And he LOVES his new bed. He's never been a fan of pet beds so I hesitated to buy him this, but I'm so glad I did. It's his favorite place to be now, and it totally works to trap in his body heat and give his old arthritic bones the padding he needs.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlette Ibis

customer_reviews.title: Losing its shape, dots on bottom falling off everywhere, cedar shavings inside that fall out when you take the cover off.
customer_reviews.text: It's overfilled in the middle, and my small dog tends to lay on the edge. It's losing its shape, and the fill doesn't extend to all the sides leaving fabric around the edge with no filling. The little anti skid dots on the bottom are coming off. I took the cover off to wash it and in addition to the poly-fill inside are cedar shavings. It made a huge mess all over my floor. The only reason I didn't give it one star is because my dog lays in the middle of it so it does get used.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Not one of my five cats will use it.
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, I purchased this for one of my five cats. I thought he would love it. Would not even try it out. In fact five out of five cats will not even put a paw in it. So it sits on a chair in the living room alone. Most likely will donate it to the Forgotten Felines Thrift Store. It looks very nice and you would think it would be comfy. My theory is, the middle is to puffy. I guess I will go back to picking up different size boxes at Costco for them to sleep in.
customer_reviews.author: Poleke

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it
customer_reviews.text: I first bought the round bed, and although my cats loved it and tried to sleep in it, it really was too small for them. They would balance themselves part in, part out of the bed. But they really did want to be in it. So, I bought the rectangular version that is slightly larger. This is perfect for the cats. If you have a large cat, buy the rectangular version. I put the round and rectangular versions together on the floor and the two cats move between the beds at will. They love to knead and purr and crash. Have not washed yet, but the beds certainly seem sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Just Keep on Dreaming

customer_reviews.title: His New Favorite Bed!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t love the color of this bed, but the previous reviews and the aspects of it being self-warming and super comfortable, convinced me to give it a try. I think you’ll see from the photos alone that my cat absolutely fell in love with it, and in a very short amount of time. I put a small blanket over it, to hide the color but also to make it easier to clean (my cat sheds quite a bit) and he uses it daily and nightly as his favorite place to sleep/watch birds out the window. Highly recommend, even if you aren’t a huge fan of the color either.
customer_reviews.author: ttmharrison

customer_reviews.title: It's OK...
customer_reviews.text: These seem warm, however, neither my barn cats nor my house cat liked them. I believe it's because they make a crinkling noise when they get into it and they roll around when the cat tries to get into them, probably making them feel unstable. I did put my house cat's crate pad inside this bed and then circled it with a blanket to keep it from rolling around and finally my house cat is using it. My barn cats have no interest in trying it.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Berns

customer_reviews.title: 18-yr old cat loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 18 year old cat loves his bed and this solves the cat hair in the face while your sleeping issue. When they get that old they tend to get cold and want to cuddle which is fine but I'd rather not cough up a hair ball. Haha. I'm very happy with this purchase and so is he.
customer_reviews.author: Rebeca T

customer_reviews.title: The best pet bed out there
customer_reviews.text: We got this bed for our shih tzu who is always cold. We humans can be overheated and dying and she would be shivering. We didn't anticipate how much our cat would enjoy this bed as well. There is a mad dash in the evenings to see who gets the bed first. It's become a bit crazy so we've ordered a second one. Now they both have their own and can stay toasty no matter the weather. The material is nice, it is well made and has survived 3 years of constant daily use. Really the only time the animals get along is when they are snuggled into their beds.
customer_reviews.author: LessThanJess

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Never tried cleaning this yet, but it looks like it wouldn't be too easy to get all the cat hair out of it. Plus, idk if it even makes sense to clean this regularly bc there will just be more cat hair. Our cat loves this in the colder months. She looks so comfortable in there and its her favorite place to sleep in the cold months. In the summer, I think it is too hot in there for her, so she's not in there much. It is a very cute small animal bed. Looks well made. Make sure you select the size you want because I think there's 2 options... or maybe more...I don't remember exactly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super soft!
customer_reviews.text: Beds are super soft and arrived with no smells or anything. I have not put them to use yet, but I already know my cats will love them based on how soft they are. Perfect size too! UPDATE: Nearly a year later. I purchased two of these because I have two cats. One of my cats is the alpha, and she has claimed both beds. That said, she absolutely loves them! She can be seen "making biscuits" at any given time in one of the beds. She likes to be in whatever room I am in, so I placed one bed in my bedroom and the other in the living room near the couch.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Prestridge

customer_reviews.title: A favorite for everyone!
customer_reviews.text: We just got this bed this morning, and by the afternoon they couldnt stay out of it! My big boy, Winston, is a little over 15 lbs and fits in it perfectly. Win has never liked cat beds, but I put it down, and he immediately laid in it and started making biscuits! My little girl, Gema, loves it too and stretches out to take up the whole thing. Very, very happy with this bed, and I'll probably end up buying another one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Both cats are fans of this bed!
customer_reviews.text: Our kitties got new beds for Christmas! 😻🎁🎄 They got them on Monday. Both cats were hesitant to use them. We draped Roxy's old blanket over hers and she took to it pretty quickly. Then we removed the blanket and she is now constantly in it. Rosie was more picky. We lined it with a worn shirt of our son's. She still avoided it like the plague. We locked her in the bathroom last night so she wouldn't bother the presents. We removed the rugs and put the bed in there. She caved and used it instead of the cold, hard floor and now has seeked it out without being forced!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya M. Kanine

customer_reviews.title: Great for newborn Puppies
customer_reviews.text: Lifetime = birth thru 8 weeks old (depends on dog breed) Used this for newborn puppies. 8 German Shepherd Puppies would find their way in & out here during that time. As time passed, less puppies fit in it. (obviously) Easily washable by throwing into a washing machine Found myself laying my head this with the pups at night Not very sturdy, climable sidewalls, if carrying need to cradle to make sure sides don't give
customer_reviews.author: Russell Braithwaite

customer_reviews.title: The self-warming feature is great! My cat loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this. We bought it for her to have a bed in the basement and wanted the self-warming feature as it stays a couple degrees colder down there. I read several reviews about people tearing them apart and not finding a "warming layer", so was a little skeptical, but it got surprisingly warm after a second of putting my hand against it. She has anither bed (not warming) upstairs and when compared side-by-side, this bed definitely warms up fast and holds heat for a little while after taking my hand off. I would definitely recommend this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Medler

customer_reviews.title: 19.5 inch round... it's a hit!  ordering a 2nd one
customer_reviews.text: I washed & dried the bed per the instrucitons. It took a couple of days but my senior cat decided it was worthy of him tonight. I'm sold! The "base" is poofy. I put catnip in it which my non-senior cat promptly ate without getting in the bed. :) I wanted it to work for my senior cat and, because he likes it, I'm getting a second one for a second location. Boom! Note: I bought it without seeing all the cute photos from other reviewers. Wow!
customer_reviews.author: QueenOPearls

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this bed was a little small when I got it but I just recently adopted a 26 lb. cat that fits in it. I was shocked. She loves it! It's very soft and padded well. I think the kitties will really appreciate it when it cools down. We are very hot here now.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy T Glisson

customer_reviews.title: Sylvester loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My Maine coone cat has been picky with beds over his lifetime but he definitely loves this one! I am sure I will be replacing it in a year or so like I do every other bed he has because he loves to paw at it but its definitely a keeper according to him :)
customer_reviews.author: 801Jones

customer_reviews.title: The cat loves it--and has from the beginning
customer_reviews.text: She's finally decided that this is her place. She decided that on Day One. She got it for Christmas a year ago. Nice to have her choose her own bed instead of my loveseat!
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: ... mine came with the reflective layer and my cats LOVE them! I actually am ordering a few more ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about the one star reviewer but mine came with the reflective layer and my cats LOVE them! I actually am ordering a few more since they are such a big hit. You can feel the heat coming off the cat when they get out of the bed, nice and soft, easy to clean, would look nice in any décor. Here's my Ragdoll kitten who weighs twelve pounds fitting in it with room to spare, but it's not too big, my smaller cat likes it too, it kind of squishes with the size of the cat.
customer_reviews.author: Crow's Roots

customer_reviews.title: Instant hit
customer_reviews.text: It's been 3 hours and already this is my cat's new favorite place to be. I was initially concerned that the bottom was *too* plushy; it's definitely overstuffed so the bottom isn't flat. No worries though, she seems to love it!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew K

customer_reviews.title: The pet bed looks fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: I am going to assume that this bed is a wonderful pet because it certainly looks like it should be but for some reason my cat just refuses to even try it. However, the bed looks like it would be super comfortable with a sturdy roll around the edge that you pet should feel they could lay against or curl up and be snugly and warm while napping. The fabric is sturdy and should live up to a lot of use for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Big hit
customer_reviews.text: We have three very small (5lb) dogs who LOVE this thing. They have bunches of other beds but this is, for all three, the one they love. We'll be getting more of them. Washes and dries perfectly, not so big that it gets underfoot. We have a 9lb dog who can sleep in it alone or with one of the littles. We have a fifteen lb dog and it's a bit too small for her - just to give you an idea of size.
customer_reviews.author: jeannie

customer_reviews.title: My guys fight over this bed
customer_reviews.text: My pets love this bed. There is always either a cat or tiny dog sleeping in it. They enjoy it no matter what the weather is, and if the power goes out the little ones can keep warm. I have bought several of these and they all get used pretty much constantly.Perfect for kitties but also Chihuahuas and other small dogs. And if it gets soiled it can be machine washed -- a great feature!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia J. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Fits XL sized cats
customer_reviews.text: My giant 15 lb kitty loves it. He hangs out on our table much of the day, so I wanted something more comfortable than just a hard surface. It took him a couple days to warm up to it, but now he loves it! I was afraid it would be too small for him, but he seems to like being curled in a ball.
customer_reviews.author: C N

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable Coziness For Our Pup!
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 dogs and dog beds throughout the house, the thick, flat kind. I felt that our new pup should have something that helps her to feel "cozy" and comfortable. I love this bed! It is thick and plush, with the walls high enough to support the puppy's back. Our 18 month old Beagle also loves it! High quality and great price. The outer fabric is not removable for washing, as it is with most flat dog begs, but you can spot-wash the outside of this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Christine LaRocca

customer_reviews.title: If I was a cat, I'd love it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two different cat beds because they continually stole my poor dog's bed. The kitties act like this is made of hot lava, even after spraying catnip in it. My Chiquita actually preferred the other bed. I'm hoping the dog can show them how it's done. He squeezed his 40 pounds into it with some over-hang. Who can know the mind or preferences of a cat? It's super soft, and I'm going to keep it because the price is great...maybe they just need some time (or another cold snap to pass through).
customer_reviews.author: CDub

customer_reviews.title: Makes crinkling noises
customer_reviews.text: Was going to return, but return cost too high...my 2 cats took forever to like this...it makes noises when you step into it....I kept putting my weight on it to try and get rid of the noise & to flatten it down.. finally 1 cat has been attempting to like it.......
customer_reviews.author: Maddie loves cats and all animals!

customer_reviews.title: Keeps kitty warm without a plug!
customer_reviews.text: It took awhile for the cat to use it. It had a very slight synthetic odor (couldn't tell if it was the material or the stuffing) and he avoided it like the bubonic plague for several weeks until it aired out. Once it aired, he curled up in it every day this winter and leaves it when he gets too warm (we've picked him up when he gets out of it and he feels like a little furry hearing pad!). It's nice to have a warming bed for him that doesn't have to be plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon A. Orienza

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price!
customer_reviews.text: These are cozy and easy to wash in a front loading machine. Bought 3 for my kitties and donated 8 to my local shelter. Love these. Will probably buy more as long as they are available.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy kitties!
customer_reviews.text: Love these beds. Bought two of them and the cats went nuts the minute I put them out. They both love to stretch out in them. The fabric is really soft and it does reflect back body heat. It doesn't have a loud crinkly noise like some of the self heating beds. One kitty is 7 lbs and the other one is 21lbs and both fit comfortably in the beds. Not big enough for a large dog but perfect for all kitties and small breed dogs!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Preston

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I'm always nervous to buy products like this for my cats because they never seem to like things I spend money on. However, I have a cat that LOVES to be extra warm so I thought I would give it a shot. I was expecting to have to coax him into it with catnip or something, but as soon as I put it down, he crawled right in. He now sleeps in there every night.
customer_reviews.author: Angelique

customer_reviews.title: Have to buy more for our other cats!
customer_reviews.text: Got this cat bed for our new kitten a couple of months ago, but it turns out his 2 older sisters love it, too! It's nice that this helps them stay warm without needing to be plugged in. (They have a heating pad, but you're not really supposed to keep it plugged in 24/7, so we're hoping that getting more of these beds will allow us to give the heating pad a break occasionally.) So far it seems to be holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Anne

customer_reviews.title: Cat Corner
customer_reviews.text: Pretty in color, light weight, easy to move about, and seems well made. Cats took to it after a few days and they like having a nice little out-of-the-way spot. It has lots of padding and a Sherpa like lining so its nice and cozy, malleable to fit the many different sleeping positions kitties have. I got it because the cats are 15 and 16 years old. They spend more time sleeping than in past years.
customer_reviews.author: Znon

customer_reviews.title: It rolls over
customer_reviews.text: My cat attempted to lie in it, but whenever he leans on the side, the entire bed would flop over and that startles him. So after a few times he stopped paying attention to this bed :( Also there was already some filling exposed after my cat played in it for a few days...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Luxury bed at great price for 23lb happy dog
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality—sides and bottom 2-3" thickness. Replaced a 17" (outside diameter) cat bed that our dog still gets into at times because she can curl up really tightly in there, whereas with this one there's a little extra space. If anything, I'd have liked it slightly smaller but that's because she loves to be in that tight circle. The quality seems very good (washed once with no issues), the fleece matches her fur, and the dark red of the corduroy looks great. Don't know about that self warming—I do hear a crackling sound—but I doubt it's necessary anyway with all the padding.
customer_reviews.author: M. M.

customer_reviews.title: No need to fix the space heater.
customer_reviews.text: It took me longer to get the bed out of the box than it did for my Olive to step into it (the bed) and fall in love. The crunchy base may have intrigued her or the smell of the fabric may have triggered her "soft warm space" response. Whatever made this such a done deal is making my 8lb., 15 year-old dearie very happy right now. Buying this bed was a lot easier and economical than fixing the broken space heater!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable!
customer_reviews.text: My wife takes care of a barn cat. She feeds it everyday no matter the weather. She was very concerned about the freezing temperatures lately and worried about how the cat would cope. We were sceptical about a self-warming cat bed but we tried it. The cat loves it. Every mornig after a cold night my wife checks and there is the cat snuggled in the bed. Unbelievable but when she feels the bed it is WARM. Yes in freezing cold temps the bed produces heat from the cat's body.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for two.
customer_reviews.text: The kittens love it and love hanging out of it. Literally. I did have to line the inside with their favorite basket, though, just to get them to try it out. After that, no problems!
customer_reviews.author: Thurzday_Next

customer_reviews.title: You have to get this for your cats.
customer_reviews.text: The best cat bed in the world paws down! Both cats take turns sleeping in it. The best part is I can put it at the foot of my bed and actually get some sleep. My cats have their own bed!
customer_reviews.author: Vivian T Le

customer_reviews.title: An instant hit!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't even get the beds fully out of the box and my two little dogs were instantly excited! Put the beds on the floor and they were both curled up inside. And off my couch, which was the whole point!. Twig weighs 4 pounds so she fit with room to spare. Her brother weighs about 8 pounds so his bed is a bit more snug. But they are happy as clams with their new beds!
customer_reviews.author: Goge

customer_reviews.title: they seem happy to go to sleep
customer_reviews.text: Cats are not fond of this probably because of the crunching/crinkling sound it makes when they get in it. But once in it, and after circling for about 5 minutes they settle down and go to sleep. I have not noticed any warming sensation but then again I don't sleep in it. I think the sound is what my cats don't care for....but once in it, they seem happy to go to sleep. The size is nice also.
customer_reviews.author: betsy

customer_reviews.title: Our 14 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this bed for a 14 year old kitty baby. She has some skin issues and an issue with her front paw that causes her some difficulty getting comfortable at times. She took right to this and looks peaceful as can be in this bed. I can't believe the great price for a quality bed like this. No need to clean it yet, but I know it'll be just fine.
customer_reviews.author: OpheliaS

customer_reviews.title: Useless after just two weeks
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. I received this bed less than 2 weeks ago and it is already in the trash bin. First thing was the fuzzy interior sheds EVERYWHERE. Just the act of my cats getting in and out of it and the fuzz sticks to their paws and is tracked all across the floor. Second is it has torn already on the top edge. A big rip right across it and not on a seam. Just torn. Third is the sides are so floppy they just collapse into the interior of the bed. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: J. Blakney

customer_reviews.title: Cat Immediately Loved It
customer_reviews.text: I have a smaller size self heating bed, plus a self heating pet pad. The pad gets almost no use, but the smaller bed constantly has a cat in it. So I decided to buy this larger one, thinking that it would be big enough for 2 cats to snuggle in. It totally is large enough, but it was instantly taken over by my non-snuggly cat who is not going back to the cozier small bed. It's a huge hit in our house, and I anticipate buying more as the weather gets chillier.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: The product as a cat bed is fine. However
customer_reviews.text: The product as a cat bed is fine. However, on the first wash, the tiny rubber gripping dots ALL fell off inside my dryer and semi-melted inside of it. I will be scraping all 1billion of them off for the next few days. Tag on product says it is dryer safe, which is a lie based on the condition of my dryer. Note that my dryer is NEW and I had it set on EXTRA LOW for 30-min.
customer_reviews.author: Neen23

customer_reviews.title: Animals LOVE THESE
customer_reviews.text: Bought several of these a few times now since my animals love playing musical beds. The small dogs and large cats sometimes do serious battle over these beds, so they must be good. They are well sewn, machine washable and dryable. The Label Might say they’re not.. but they are. Well... at least MINE ARE.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: While the description of the bed I bought says 19.5", a lot of that is taken up by the puffy sides. The inside dimension is only 13", and it is too small for my 13 pound cat. If she scrunches up into a tight ball, it just barely contains her. She doesn't like it, prefers a box I have for her better. Stupidly, I already removed the tags and can't return it. Otherwise, it is a very nice bed. I just wish the inside dimension had been stated in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Best cat bed ever.
customer_reviews.text: Seriously best cat bed I’ve ever purchased. Cat loves it. I love it. Super soft, cute, and warm. My cat is about 17 lbs and she curls right up in it. Definitely recommend. Also got extras for the feral cats we take care of. It’s warm due to the layer of Mylar hidden in the bedding, which you cannot see or feel, but you know it’s there because when kitty gets up that bed is warrrrrm! :) Very pleased customer here.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Noel

customer_reviews.title: After reading all the awesome reviews for this cat bed I thought
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the awesome reviews for this cat bed I thought, hey why not ? For such a great price why not try it out and see if my fur baby likes it . My big boy Bash sleeps on ANYTHING (magazines, cardboard, food wrappers, important documents) so I wasn't sure if he'd like this bed, but he loves it ! He took to the bed quickly and I didn't have to entice him . He actually purrs when he climbs into it. Thank you :) ! Highly recommend !
customer_reviews.author: Marie o

product_meta.title: Aspen Pet Self Warming Beds
product_meta.description: Style:Round Bed| Size:19.5"| Color:Barn Red/CreamAspen Pet's Self-Warming Corduroy Pet Bed features heat-reflecting technology that keeps pets warm and cozy. Lined with the same material found in Mylar space blankets, the heated cat bed reflects pets' body heat to radiate warmth with no electricity required. For additional comfort, the bed's exterior is made from plush corduroy and the sleep surface is covered in soft, faux lambswool. The bed features a textured, non-slip bottom to prevent slipping or sliding when pets step in and out. The self-warming pet bed can hand-washed to keep pets' sleeping space fresh and clean. For pets and pet parents on the go, the self-warming mat's lightweight polyester fiberfill ensures portable convenience. Offered in a wide range of sizes and shapes, pet parents can choose a bed that suits their pet's individual needs. The bed ships in a variety of attractive colors including Barn Red/Cream, Navy/Cream, and Brown/Cream. No plug needed
feature_bullets: HEAT-REFLECTING TECHNOLOGY: This large round dog & cat bed features a Mylar interior layer that reflects pets' body heat to provide comfort and warmth. Non-skid bottom is perfect for tile & hardwood floors.
LARGE PET BED: The comfy faux lambswool pet bed for dogs & cats is designed with plush sides for pets who like to burrow. The thermal bed's lightweight design is perfect for vacations & road trips.

DOG BEDS: Pets can feel at home both in the house & on-the-go with a variety of beds for cats & dogs as well as plush kennel crate mats. Features self-warming beds, orthopedic beds for senior pets, cooling cots for outdoors, pillow beds & more.

ASPEN PET: Aspen Pet provides every day essentials for pet parents, dogs & cats. Check out Aspen Pets for leash cable tie-outs, litter box accessories, pet toys, gravity water/food bowls, pet beds, dog houses, carriers & more!

JUST FOR PETS: Petmate makes a variety of pet products for dogs, cats, chickens & other small furry friends! Check out our brands such as Aspen Pet, Arm & Hammer, Booda, Chuckit!, Jackson Galaxy & more!

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
